title: BRIEF-Brompton Lifeco Split Corp's Special Meeting Canceled
text:
BRIEF-Brompton Lifeco Split Corp's Special Meeting Canceled

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 25, 2019 18:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Brompton Lifeco Split Corp's Special Meeting Canceled Sept 25 (Reuters) - Brompton Lifeco Split Corp : * SPECIAL MEETING OF BROMPTON LIFECO SPLIT CORP. CANCELLED * BROMPTON FUNDS - FUND WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE AS IT DOES CURRENTLY * BROMPTON FUNDS - ABOUT 32% OF CLASS A SHARES WERE VOTED, BUT TWO THIRDS APPROVAL THRESHOLD WAS NOT MET

BRIEF-Brompton Lifeco Split Corp's Special Meeting Canceled
